title: Kylie Jenner says Stormi, 1, is 'super-into make-up' in YouTube video
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Kylie Jenner has revealed her one-year-old daughter Stormi Webster is “super into make-up”, describing her child as “obsessed” in a YouTube tutorial video.

The billionaire make-up mogul told fans that her daughter even notices when she wears lipstick, suggesting the toddler may be on course to follow in her mum’s footsteps.

The 22-year-old said: “Stormi is actually super into make up right now - it’s amazing.

“Every time I’m wearing lipstick she notices and she looks at me and is like ‘lip lip lip’.

“I haven’t even thought about when i’m going to let Stormi wear make-up, I don’t know I’m just going to see - she might even not wanna wear make up.

“I mean, honestly how things are going though this girl is obsessed with make up.”

She added: “She begs me at this point.”

Kylie made the comments during a long-awaited make-up tutorial posted to her YouTube channel.

(Image: Kylie Jenner/Instagram)

The young mum is seen chatting to the camera while carefully applying cosmetics to her own face.

In the video, Kylie is dressed in a pink velour Chanel shirt and lets her long dark locks hang loose.

It is not the first time Kylie has opened up about Stormi’s love of make-up.

Earlier this month, she shared an adorable video of her daughter playing with one of the lipsticks from Kylie popular range.

In the clip posted to Kylie’s Instastories, the toddler is seen with lipstick smeared across her mouth, with her mum saying: “Stormi is testing out Charm [Kylie Cosmetics liquid lipstick] for you guys”.

Kylie is heard laughing affectionately at her daughter’s attempt to glam up, adding: “Oh my goodness, she really is my daughter”.

description: The 22-year-old billionaire businesswoman opened up about her daughter during a long-awaited make-up tutorial
